page.title: 01 LANDSCAPE & PEOPLE
page.content: Litcham is a very rural area.The farmers use most of the land for agriculture e.g arable, livestock and grazing.But there are about 100 houses and several amenities.The amenities are: health centre,garage,church ,primary and high schools.The housing quality is of a high standard and some are very old.Most are with flint exteriors.The population of Litcham is about 200.Leisure activities in this area include tennis,jumble sales,walks on the common land and football.The education side of Litcham is good.There are about 150 children who go to the primary school and 500 who go to the high school.
